questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against a Warlord of the Sea who rules over a kingdom in the sky. What is...?
This arc revolves around Luffy and his crew's involvement in a massive conflict against Kaido and his forces. What is...?
Set in the dangerous New World, this arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' alliance with the Heart Pirates to take down one of the Four Emperors. What is...?
This power, used by a character known as 'The Magician,' allows for the manipulation of cards. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows for the manipulation of wire. What is...?
This latest transformation of Luffy, revealed in the Wano arc, shows a significant boost in his powers and abilities. What is...?
Known for his 'Fire Fist' attack, this character is the sworn brother of the Straw Hat Pirates' captain and had the Flame-Flame Fruit. Who is...?
This vice admiral of the Marines is known for his loud voice and the power of the Barrier-Barrier Fruit. Who is...?
This former Shichibukai, known for their sand powers and role as the king of Alabasta, wields the Suna Suna no Mi. Who is...?
